footer.text: Character Guide â€¢ Build: Ororon | Update Date: 09/19/2025 | Editor: ._.samantha._.

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Elegy for the End__
Ororon's best 5-star weapon. Provides him with needed ER stat and serves as a good option for his team's damage

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Chain Breaker__ and __Song of Stillness__
Good craftable options for Ororon. Song of Stillness requires Ororon to be healed to maintain its passive.

__Alley Hunter__
Provides a nice amount of ATK and DMG%.

__The Stringless__
Becomes better the more Electro-Charged or Overloaded reactions Ororon himself triggers.

__Favonius Warbow__ 
Reduces Ororon and his teammates' energy requirements, at the cost of Ororon's personal damage.

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands>ATK% or Energy Recharge%|<goblet> Electro DMG Bonus% or ATK%|<circlet> CRIT DMG or CRIT Rate

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Burst: Dark Voices Echo
**2)**  Elemental Skill: Night's Sling
**N/A)** Normal Attack: Spiritvessel Snapshot

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value: Ororon's ER requirements are typically around 160%-190% if he's the solo Electro in the team and ~120% if there's another Electro character in the team
